Option.Name: Horde
Option.Description: Whether the build is running under Horde

Option.Name: ProjectFile
Option.Description: Path to the project file. Can be used instead of specifying ProjectName and ProjectPath separately.

Option.Name: ProjectName
Option.Description: Name of Project

Option.Name: ProjectPath
Option.Description: Path to the folder that contains your project

Option.Name: IsContentOnlyProject
Option.Description: Is the project a content only project?

Option.Name: TargetName
Option.Description: If your project supports both Game and Client you can set this, otherwise one will be selected

Option.Name: EditorTargetName
Option.Description: Specify the editor target name if different than (ProjectName)Editor

Option.Name: CookedEditorTargetName
Option.Description: Specify the cooked editor target name if different than (ProjectName)CookedEditor

Option.Name: PreNodeName
Option.Description: String to prepend to node name

Option.Name: PreLabelName
Option.Description: String to prepend to label name

Option.Name: GenericCompileArguments
Option.Description: Configurable compile args applied to all compile targets.

Option.Name: ExtraToolCompileArguments
Option.Description: Extra arguments to use when building the tools

Option.Name: ExtraEditorCompileArguments
Option.Description: Extra arguments to use when building the editor

Option.Name: ExtraTargetCompileArguments
Option.Description: Extra arguments to use when building targets

Option.Name: MapIniSection
Option.Description: MapIniSection argument to pass when cooking

Option.Name: ExtraCookArguments
Option.Description: Extra arguments to use when cooking

Option.Name: ExtraStageAndPackageArguments
Option.Description: Extra arguments to use when staging and packaging

Option.Name: ExtraPackageOnlyArguments
Option.Description: Extra arguments to use when staging only

Option.Name: TargetPlatformFilteredExtraStageAndPackageArguments
Option.Description: Extra arguments to use when staging and packaging. Filtered to specific platforms via TargetPlatformFilteredExtraStageAndPackageArgumentsFilter.

Option.Name: TargetPlatformFilteredExtraStageAndPackageArgumentsFilter
Option.Description: Platform filter applied to TargetPlatformFilteredExtraStageAndPackageArguments.

Option.Name: WithRemoteExecWorkers
Option.Description: If your project uses standalone remote execution workers

Option.Name: WithInterchangeWorker
Option.Description: To compile Interchange Worker in Compile Tools node

Option.Name: UseIncrementalAgents
Option.Description: Use incremental agents for building

Option.Name: AgentOverride
Option.Description: If set, other logic is ignored and this agent type is used for all non-test work.

Option.Name: TestAgentOverride
Option.Description: If set, other logic is ignored and this agent type is used for all test work.

Option.Name: TargetPlatformTestAgentOverride
Option.Description: Override agent type use to run target platform tests

Option.Name: ClientCompileAgentOverride
Option.Description: Specifies the agent type to use for C++ compilation jobs for target platform binaries.

Option.Name: UnrealInsightsBuildConfiguration
Option.Description: In which configuration to build Unreal Insights, if included. Shipping, Debug, or Development.

Option.Name: IncludeUnrealInsightsInToolCompile
Option.Description: Include Unreal Insights into Compile Tools prerequisites

Option.Name: IncludeEpicWebHelperInToolCompile
Option.Description: Include EpicWebHelper into Compile Tools prerequisites

Option.Name: WithDeviceReservation
Option.Description: Whether to re-use devices and installed builds for a sequence of tests, where supported

Option.Name: DefaultEditorPlatforms
Option.Description: Default Editor platforms

Option.Name: DefaultCookedEditorPlatforms
Option.Description: Default Cooked Editor platforms

Option.Name: DefaultTargetPlatforms
Option.Description: Default Target platforms

Option.Name: DefaultTargetConfigurations
Option.Description: Default Target configurations

Option.Name: DefaultCookedEditorConfigurations
Option.Description: Default Cooked Editor configurations

Option.Name: DefaultEditorTestList
Option.Description: Default Editor test list

Option.Name: DefaultTargetTestList
Option.Description: Default Target test list

Option.Name: DefaultCookedEditorTestList
Option.Description: Default Cooked Editor test list

Option.Name: NetworkTempRootOverride
Option.Description: Network temp root override

Option.Name: NetworkPublishRootOverride
Option.Description: Network publish root override

Option.Name: NetworkReportRootOverride
Option.Description: Network report root override

Option.Name: SymbolServerPath
Option.Description: Symbol server path

Option.Name: PublishCloudSnapshot
Option.Description: Publish build to cloud host

Option.Name: EnableSymbolStore
Option.Description: Enables the upload of debugging symbols

Option.Name: DedicatedServer
Option.Description: Project uses a dedicated server

Option.Name: Versioned
Option.Description: Whether to embed changelist number into binaries

Option.Name: SkipBuild
Option.Description: Whether to skip building

Option.Name: SkipCook
Option.Description: Whether to skip cooking and packaging

Option.Name: SkipPackage
Option.Description: Whether to skip packaging

Option.Name: SkipPublish
Option.Description: Whether to skip cooking, packaging, publishing

Option.Name: SkipTest
Option.Description: Whether to skip testing

Option.Name: EditorBootTest
Option.Description: Run a simple boot test on the editor before other tests

Option.Name: TargetBootTest
Option.Description: Run a simple boot test on target platforms before other tests

Option.Name: CookedEditorBootTest
Option.Description: Run a simple boot test on cooked editor platforms before other tests

Option.Name: FillEditorDDC
Option.Description: Whether to fill the editor DDC before running any editor tests

Option.Name: EditorTestList
Option.Description: Tests to run on the editor. Test1+Test2 etc

Option.Name: TargetTestList
Option.Description: Tests to run on the target platform(s). Test1+Test2 etc

Option.Name: CookedEditorTestList
Option.Description: Tests to run on the cooked editor. Test1+Test2 etc

Option.Name: EditorPlatformsToSkipBootTests
Option.Description: Editor platforms that should skip boot tests.

Option.Name: TargetPlatformsToSkipBootTests
Option.Description: Target platforms that should skip boot tests.

Option.Name: CookedEditorPlatformsToSkipBootTests
Option.Description: Cooked editor platforms that should skip boot tests.

Option.Name: TestsRequireEditor
Option.Description: Whether to force tests to require editor compilation

Option.Name: PathSettingsFile
Option.Description: Path settings to use

Option.Name: GauntletSettingsFile
Option.Description: Gauntlet settings to use

Option.Name: AnnotationsTarget
Option.Description: Set annotations target

Option.Name: AnnotationsPlatforms
Option.Description: List of platforms that require annotations

Option.Name: AnnotationsTests
Option.Description: List of tests that require annotations

Error.Message: ProjectName and ProjectPath must be specified
